 fnheader
 Inserts a function header with pre, post, author, date and param descriptions.
 Your Name
 
 Expansion
 
 
 
 
 
 param1name
 The name of the first parameter.
 param1
 
 
 param1type
 The type of the first parameter.
 String
 
 
 param2name
 The name of the second parameter.
 param2
 
 
 param2type
 The type of the second parameter.
 Integer
 
 
 
 
'---------------------------------- 
'Pre: 
'Post:
'Author: $username$
'Date: $date$
'$param1name$ ($param1type$): 
'$param2name$ ($param2type$): 
'Summary: 
Private Function Foo(ByVal $param1name$ As $param1type$, ByVal $param2name$ As $param2type$)
